title: RPG Maker - Encrypted Realm
description: Zelda + Hollow Knight music, but slightly more futuristic.
longDescription:
Encrypted Realm is a diverse pack of music. You'll find Unique area themes, a matching boss fight song, and more!

Music inspired by Hollow Knight and Zelda, but with a slightly more futuristic/electronic sound on some of the tracks.

This music inspires exploration, and mystery for a diverse set of levels/areas. Some Ancient Temple themes, along with more electronic areas, and some puzzle solving/time running out, style themes.


Listen to Demos: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zn_kDQsuU4I


All I ask of those using the music is a "Music by Matt Lacey" credit in the games credits!


Also if you purchased the pack, and there is any tracks you like, but maybe want one or two small things changed,

(drums turned down, extended intro, etc.), please email me at mattlacey66@gmail.com, I'd be happy to oblige help make my music more suited for your game.
technicalDetails:
Track List

  •  Sacred Relics
  •  Soul Realm
  •  Temporal Shrine
  • Temple of the Condemned
  • Ancient Grove
  • Mind Labyrinth
  • Savior's Melody
  • Digital Sanctum
  • Veiled Intelligence
  • A Dark Past
  • Boss Fight


Number of Audio Wavs: 11

Number of Audio Cues: 11

Sample rate / bit rate: 16bit, 44,100 Hz

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 38 minutes

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=zn_kDQsuU4I

Important/Additional Notes: For use in a game, please add a "Composer/Music By" for me, Matt Lacey, in the game's credits, Thanks!
